TopicTitle: Problems with Pre-Order Confirmation E-mail, reply here

Articles.Content:
I think you guys know, but, thanks for solving my issue

PD

Hi, I still haven\'t received an email containing my login details for the store.

If you could send them to the email associated with this account (I assume SMF allows admins to see users\' email addresses) I would appreciate it.

Thanks!

Hi,

I paid for the preorder, got the confirmation from PayPal but nothing else. No sign of anything in the spam folder either.

Cheers,

Craig

I aswell have received no confirmation email on my pre-order. Nothing in the spam folder.

I do have a paypal confirmation email, though, should I provide you guys with any information? I would very much like to have that confirmation email.

Regards,

Dominic
I received Paypal Confirmation way back on 13th December (haha unlucky!) but nothing else, can you help me please?
I pre ordered 7 dollars on January 14th. I still haven\'t gotten a message confirming the preorder in any of my inboxes. The only message I\'ve recieved is the donation one.

I paid 7 dollars on the 19th of December, but because I used bank transfer, it probably took up to a week before you actually received the money. I didn\'t get any message, except one from PayPal that my payment was confirmed. However, I\'ve never checked my spam filter, so probably it came in there and was auto deleted. Where can I check whether my payment has been confirmed?

Hello. I\'ve made a pre order back when it was first available, through the forums account (october I think?) and I\'m not quite sure, but I don\'t remember receiving a confirmation e-mail (also didn\'t receive the store password, but already reported it in the topic). Is it possible to verify if my pre order is still valid?

Thanks.

EDIT: I\'ve verified my paypal transaction and it was September 1st, not October as I said previously.

I have 4 emails:

Account creation

Order confirmation

Donation

Forum account creation

I donated $10 is this normal?
Still no email from yourselves regarding the donation on 13th December, any chance it could be sorted please?

I have 4 emails:

Account creation

Order confirmation

Donation

Forum account creation

I donated $10 is this normal?

Yes, that\'s all the emails you should have.

If you cannot see the download link in your KSP Store Profile Account, then it is a problem

Cheers.

Hi, i have received my paypal receipt confirmation but no e-mail detailing the download link etc my account on the website logs in and works fine.

Hope you can help,
It has been a half a month and still no pre order email on any of my adresses...

Idk if it has been mentioned before but I thought it might be helpful to share this, just in case you don\'t know this.

On another forum (www.leaguereplays.com) we have a similiar problem with user registration mails that never seem to reach their destination.

Most of them have a hotmail/livemail as target. We found out that their software blocks \'bulk\' mails and deletes those mails.

They don\'t even get into the spam folder.

It seems logic for software to detect lots of registration mails as bulk spam when a very large group of people creates a account.

The fun thing is that these mails do arrive when there\'s no large groups registering (requesting activation mails) at the same time.

If you already knew this then sorry that I didn\'t take the time to read through all the posts.

I just want to help you.

Edit: mm maybe I shouldn\'t have posted it here. I just did re-read the title. Sorry.

Hello finally got to pre ordered the game but i never got the email with the password and all that stuff i only got the confirmation email. this is the email i used

[email protected]

Thanks
Hey, preordered in december of last year, using my forum email address. Spam filter must have ate my store login.

I think a clear procedure on what to do, somewhere stickied and clearly labeled is in order. If it\'s there, and I\'m just not finding it, well, I guess I\'m ignorant. However, I preordered the game back in December and haven\'t received this confirmation email. I\'ve also tried to open the old store link from the original email, and it says I\'m not allowed.
I preordered quite a while ago, but it seems like the spam filter must have stolen my login info too. None of the other KSP emails I get end up in there, though.
